'''''Amon Hen'' 228''' is the two-hundred-and-twenty-eighth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[March]] [[2011]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen228.jpg|The House of Tom Bombadil]]''
** By: Colin Williams
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Additional Decorative Artwork
** By: Steve Lines
* Announcements
* [[Beyond Bree]] 30th Anniversary Announcement
* AGM Announcement
* Along the Road - [[The Return of the Ring|2012 news]]
** By: Claire Richards
* Artwork: ''[[Éowyn]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Mythcon 42 Announcement
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|International]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* Hall of Fire
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Regarding the Importance of the Date [[25 March|March 25]]th...
** By: David Doerr
* Plight of the [[Dwarves]]
** By: Mark Bednarowski
* Studying [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]... in Quebec!
** By: Michael Bouchard
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* Artwork: ''[[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] and the [[Palantíri|Palantír]]''
** By: Jef Murray
* Review: ''Looking for the King''
** By: Ade Tucker
* Review: ''The 2011 Tolkien Calendar''
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
* Artwork: ''[[Goldberry]]''
** By: Jef Murray
* Poem: ''After''
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* Puzzle: [[Saruman|Sharkey]]'s Sudoku Solution
** By: Jordan Stewart
* News from [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Letters
* Artwork: ''Reading [[Gandalf]]''
** By: Jef Murray
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* New Members
* Member Profile
** By: Hanusia Tkaczyk
* Dates for your Diary/Committee
